#Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Contract Title**: K4D34-230504 - Air Handling Unit RFP

**Contract Reference**: WS4115572435-Doc4115907589

**Tender Status**: Cancelled

## Tenders Specifications
-----------------------------

### Procurement Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: August 10, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 5, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

### Procurement Category
-------------------------

*   **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

### Procurement Method
-----------------------

*   **Method**: Competitive, open bidding

### Contracting Entity
----------------------

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Goods or Services
---------------------

*   **Goods/Services Description**: The procurement is for a custom air handling unit to replace system 22 at the Canada Centre for Inland Waters located in Burlington, ON, Canada.
*   **UNSPSC Code**: 40101500 (Ventilation) and 40101600 (Air circulation and parts and accessories)

### Important Notes
-------------------

*   **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16974866?extsite=MTY5NzQ4NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   **Contact Information**: Darlene Keenan, (SPAC/PSPC) [\](mailto:darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The contracting entity has not provided any additional information besides the ones stated above.
The notice is in english and french and so is the contact information. 
If the notice ever gets released, I will add any important information, but as of now, there's no word on it being released again or released at all.
